import { deletePrivateFile, deletePublicFile, getPrivateFiles } from '@/actions/s3' import { Button, buttonVariants } from '@/components/ui/button' import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card' import prisma from '@/lib/db' import { CloudDownload, Trash2 } from 'lucide-react' import Link from 'next/link' import { UploadPrivateFile, UploadPublicFile } from './client' export default async function RootPage() { const publicFiles = await prisma.publicFiles.findMany({ orderBy: { created_at: 'asc' } }) const privateFiles = await getPrivateFiles({ orderBy: { created_at: 'asc' } }) return (
Public Uploads
{publicFiles.map((f) => (
{f.original_name}
Created {f.created_at.toLocaleString()}
Download
))}
Private Uploads
{privateFiles.map((f) => (
{f.original_name}
Created {f.created_at.toLocaleString()}
Download
))}
) }

version: '3.9'

services:
    db:
        image: postgres
        ports:
            - '5432:5432'
        restart: always
        shm_size: 128mb
        environment:
            POSTGRES_USER: postgres
            POSTGRES_PASSWORD: password
            POSTGRES_DB: postgres

# https://console.aws.amazon.com/console
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=""
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=""
AWS_REGION="us-east-1"
AWS_PUBLIC_BUCKET_NAME="public"
AWS_PRIVATE_BUCKET_NAME="private"

DATABASE_URL="postgresql://postgres:password@localhost:5432/postgres?schema=public"

NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL="http://localhost:3000"

import { createEnv } from '@t3-oss/env-nextjs'
import dotenv from 'dotenv'
import { z } from 'zod'

dotenv.config()

export const env = createEnv({
	server: {
		AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID: z.string().min(1),
		AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY: z.string().min(1),
		AWS_REGION: z.string().min(1),
		AWS_PUBLIC_BUCKET_NAME: z.string().min(1),
		AWS_PRIVATE_BUCKET_NAME: z.string().min(1),

		DATABASE_URL: z.string().url(),
	},
	client: { NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL: z.string().url() },
	runtimeEnv: {
		AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID: process.env.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID,
		AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY: process.env.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY,
		AWS_REGION: process.env.AWS_REGION,
		AWS_PUBLIC_BUCKET_NAME: process.env.AWS_PUBLIC_BUCKET_NAME,
		AWS_PRIVATE_BUCKET_NAME: process.env.AWS_PRIVATE_BUCKET_NAME,

		DATABASE_URL: process.env.DATABASE_URL,

		NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL: process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL,
	},
})

import { S3Client } from '@aws-sdk/client-s3'
export const s3 = new S3Client()

model PublicFiles {
    id         String   @id @default(cuid())
    created_at DateTime @default(now())
    updated_at DateTime @updatedAt

    key           String @unique
    original_name String
    mime_type     String
    url           String
}

model PrivateFiles {
    id         String   @id @default(cuid())
    created_at DateTime @default(now())
    updated_at DateTime @updatedAt

    key           String @unique
    original_name String
    mime_type     String
}

-- CreateTable

    "original_name" TEXT NOT NULL,
    "mime_type" TEXT NOT NULL,

    CONSTRAINT "PublicFiles_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("id")
